update ASYNC_PROC_AUTO_TASK
TASK_ID = #{record.taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
TASK_TYPE = #{record.taskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_DATA = #{record.taskData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIMES_MAX_RETRY = #{record.timesMaxRetry,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STATUS_PROC = #{record.statusProc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS_PROC_DESC = #{record.statusProcDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROC_START_TIME = #{record.procStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PROC_END_TIME = #{record.procEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TIMES_PROC_FAILED = #{record.timesProcFailed,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FAILED_REASON_CODE = #{record.failedReasonCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CREATED_TIME = #{record.createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPD_TIME = #{record.lastUpdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update ASYNC_PROC_AUTO_TASK
TASK_TYPE = #{taskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_DATA = #{taskData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIMES_MAX_RETRY = #{timesMaxRetry,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STATUS_PROC = #{statusProc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS_PROC_DESC = #{statusProcDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PROC_END_TIME = #{procEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where TASK_ID = #{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ASYNC_PROC_AUTO_TASK set TASK_TYPE = #{taskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASK_DATA = #{taskData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIMES_MAX_RETRY = #{timesMaxRetry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS_PROC = #{statusProc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_PROC_DESC = #{statusProcDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROC_START_TIME = #{procStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PROC_END_TIME = #{procEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TIMES_PROC_FAILED = #{timesProcFailed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FAILED_REASON_CODE = #{failedReasonCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAILED_REASON_DESC = #{failedReasonDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPD_TIME = #{lastUpdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where TASK_ID = #{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
